events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the Software Engineer position, showing strong experience in backend development and cloud infrastructure.
The application was reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster due to mentioned skills in software development and DevOps practices.
A recruiter specializing in technical roles was assigned to manage the candidate’s application and coordinate the next steps in the hiring process.
Conducted an initial screening call to assess the candidate’s technical background and their fit within the software engineering team.
The candidate responded positively, expressing enthusiasm about the role and availability for technical interviews in the coming week.
Scheduled a technical interview with the candidate, focusing on software engineering principles, coding challenges, and DevOps experience.
